entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AppThemeBinding BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage not working #24428
  • Receiving text sent to the MAUI app using Share function on Android does not work #24423
    Backlog
  • No se encuentra la tarea "maui: Build". #24419

Closed

  • Bug report page shows a broken link to Xamarin.Forms repo. #24424
  • App crash in Release Mode when binding ItemSource in CollectionView #24416

PullRequests

Created

  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/android
  • Remove excessive Application API docs #24427
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • BarBackground with Brush in TabbedPage on theme change #24425
    community ✨

Merged

  • Remove Xamarin.Forms repo link in issue template #24426
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [net9.0] Fix loop CarouselViewHandler2 #24230
    9.0-rc1
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    community ✨
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨
  • Fix shadow consistency on Android and iOS #24415
    community ✨
  • Fix navigation stuck on iOS when pushing on hidden tab section in TabBar #22574
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix border lagging and unwanted animations on iOS #24360
    community ✨
